ygData.subject: Re: Crowded Zones
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night (or this morning, depends on how you look at 12am), I was in Unrest was a group of 5 for a while.  I did a / which will tell ya who s in the zone
ygData.messageBody:
Last night (or this morning, depends on how you look at 12am), I was in
Unrest was a group of 5 for a while. I did a / which will tell ya who's in
the zone and it said there were only 55 people in Unrest. Yes 55 people but
still laggy as crap in there. I got attacked by a Werebat and some kinda
skel maybe a monk can't remember but I could not see them at all, thats
happened to me in Steamfont with Minos. It'll say you are hit by a Mino for
whatever but you can't see them. But anyways I take off from the Werebat
and Skel just to be killed by a Hag. But running even with SoW on ya in
Unrest can be a pain cause of the lag. At times it wasn't bad at all but
other times WOW lag slowed ya down a lot.
Also looted a corpse someone left in Unrest to find a Small Bronze Collar.
Heard it was worth maybe 10-12pp but sell it to a store and they only wanna
give ya 8gp, yeah right like I'd take 8gp for a Bronze Collar.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 16 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> From: jdean2@...
>
> I know, I know, Rodcet Nife isn't as crowded as
> many of the other servers, but it can still be
> crowded. I suggest searching for new areas. I
> have found a zone that has never had more than 25
> people in it since I have been there. Exp. is
> great and I am making about 60pp a day in loot.
> Did I mention that I now have full bronze from
> this same zone? I am not a level 49 player
> either. I made 18 last night and I already have
> two bubbles of exp. toward 19. I have all the lvl
> 19 spells bought, an incredible amount of jewelry,
> and over 500pp in the bank. Once again I implore
> you to travel and to form 6 member groups. If you
> hear about a great place then every one else has
> also. Find your own area. There are many that
> are hardly ever visited and you'll have your
> cloice on what, when, and where to kill.
>
> Blessed
> Level 18 Cleric
> Rodcet Nife
>
